verse.gurmukhi: coru gieAw Gir swh dY Gr AMdir viVAw[
verse.unicode: ਚੋਰੁ ਗਇਆ ਘਰਿ ਸਾਹ ਦੈ ਘਰ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵੜਿਆ।

en.bdb: A thief entered the house of a rich person.

transliteration.english: chor giaa ghar saeh dhai ghar a(n)dhar vaRiaa|
transliteration.hindi: चोरु गइआ घरि साह दै घर अंदरि वड़िआ।
transliteration.en: chor giaa ghar saeh dhai ghar a(n)dhar vaRiaa|
transliteration.hi: चोरु गइआ घरि साह दै घर अंदरि वड़िआ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃɔr Gɪɑ Gʰər sɑh d̪æ Gʰər əŋd̪ər ʋəɽɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: چور گایا گھر ساه دَے گھر اںدر وڑِآ۔

en.bdb: Carefully watching the four corners he came to the upper room.

verse.gurmukhi: suienw rupw pMf bMn@ih AglweI AiVAw[
verse.unicode: ਸੁਇਨਾ ਰੁਪਾ ਪੰਡ ਬੰਨੑਹਿ ਅਗਲਾਈ ਅੜਿਆ।

en.bdb: He gathered the money and gold and tied them in a bundle; but still his greed delayed him.

transliteration.english: suinaa rupaa pa(n)dd ba(n)n(h)h agalaiee aRiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सुइना रुपा पंड बंन्नहि अगलाई अड़िआ।
transliteration.en: suinaa rupaa pa(n)dd ba(n)n(h)h agalaiee aRiaa|
transliteration.hi: सुइना रुपा पंड बंन्नहि अगलाई अड़िआ।
transliteration.ipa: sʊeɪnɑ rʊpɑ pəŋɖ bəŋn@əh əGəlɑei əɽɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سُانا رُپا پںڈ بنّھه اگلاای اڑآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: loB lhir hlkwieAw lUx hWfw PiVAw[
verse.unicode: ਲੋਭ ਲਹਰਿ ਹਲਕਾਇਆ ਲੂਣ ਹਾਂਡਾ ਫੜਿਆ।

en.bdb: Getting impatient in greed he caught hold of a salt-pot.

transliteration.english: lobh lahar halakaiaa loon haa(n)ddaa faRiaa|
transliteration.hindi: लोभ लहरि हलकाइआ लूण हाँडा फड़िआ।
transliteration.en: lobh lahar halakaiaa loon haa(n)ddaa faRiaa|
transliteration.hi: लोभ लहरि हलकाइआ लूण हाँडा फड़िआ।
transliteration.ipa: lɔɓ ləhər hələkɑɪɑ luɳ hɑⁿəɖɑ fəɽɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: لوبھ لهر هلکااآ لُوݨ هاںڈا پھڑِآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: cuKku lY ky ciKAw iqsu kKu n KiVAw[
verse.unicode: ਚੁਖਕੁ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਚਖਿਆ ਤਿਸੁ ਕਖੁ ਨ ਖੜਿਆ।

en.bdb: A bit of it he took out and tasted; he left every thing there and came, out.

transliteration.english: chukhak lai ke chakhiaa tis kakh na khaRiaa|
transliteration.hindi: चुखकु लै के चखिआ तिसु कखु न खड़िआ।
transliteration.en: chukhak lai ke chakhiaa tis kakh na khaRiaa|
transliteration.hi: चुखकु लै के चखिआ तिसु कखु न खड़िआ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃʊkʰək læ ke t͡ʃəkʰɪəɑ t̪ɪs kəkʰ nə kʰəɽɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: چُکھک لَے کے چکھآ تس ککھ ن کھڑِآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: lUx hrwmI gunhgwru DVu DMmV DiVAw ]10]
verse.unicode: ਲੂਣ ਹਰਾਮੀ ਗੁਨਹਗਾਰੁ ਧੜੁ ਧੰਮੜ ਧੜਿਆ ॥੧੦॥

en.bdb: That thief also knew, that an ungrateful person is beaten like a drum (in the Lord's court).

transliteration.english: loon haraamee gunahagaar dhaR dha(n)maR dhaRiaa ||10||
transliteration.hindi: लूण हरामी गुनहगारु धड़ु धंमड़ धड़िआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.en: loon haraamee gunahagaar dhaR dha(n)maR dhaRiaa ||10||
transliteration.hi: लूण हरामी गुनहगारु धड़ु धंमड़ धड़िआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.ipa: luɳ hərɑmi GʊnəhəGɑr t̪əɽ t̪əŋməɽ t̪əɽɪəɑ.1ə0.
transliteration.ur: لُوݨ هرامیِ گُنهگار دھڑ دھںمڑ دھڑآ ۔۔۱۰۔۔
